expectedBehavior.egyptianRoom: Room that looks like an Egyptian tomb with coffin in center
expectedBehavior.sceptreUse: Wave sceptre at Aragain Falls to solidify rainbow

notes: Coffin is a treasure worth 15 points
Sceptre inside coffin is worth 4 points
Sceptre is needed for rainbow puzzle - wave at falls to solidify rainbow
Must have rope to descend from Dome Room to Torch Room
Troll combat is random - may need multiple attempts
Egyptian Room also contains jeweled scarab in some versions

metadata.conversionNote: Converted from 'commands' format to 'entries' format - expectedOutput fields need to be populated
